extendedInfo.description: DO YOU SEE THE CONNECTION?A combination between the most popular games ever developed, 100 Doors 4 Pics 1 Word!The human mind wants to see patterns and connections. Find out if you can.Each door contains four pictures. What is the common for all four?âGREAT FUNâWork your brain and figure out which word we are looking for. Feel the happiness when it comes to you!This is a combination between a brainy puzzler and a creative word game.âQUALITY PICTURESâHD pictures from professional photographers.âHIGHLY ADDICTIVEâEasy to access. Just play and have fun. Thatâs what itâs all about!Keywords: 100 Doors, 100 Floors, 100 Crypts, 4 Pics 1 Word, What's the word, What is the word, 100 Doors: 4 Pics 1 Word, 100 Doors of Revenge, quiz, puzzle, brain, IQ, new, fun, addictive.Disclaimer: We are in no way associated with any other creators of 100 Doors or 4 Pics 1 Word Games. All copyright information is on the pictures, everything is either public domain or under the creative commons license.

reviews.title: Missy C
reviews.comment: Very fun game puts your brain to thinking and improves your knowledge. Also passes time for you anytime or anywhere.
reviews.author: Missy Caldwell

reviews.title: Fun app
reviews.comment: Fun app, but I\'m stuck at level 18.  I agree with the user who says that you start with some coins. Or make less coins needed to delete and reveal letters.
reviews.author: Mikayla Eckel Cifrese

reviews.title: Fun but.......
reviews.comment: Do any of these games ever get finished??? I\'m so sick of getting into a game and that\'s it after a few levels maybe they should change the name to \" a few doors \"instead of 100
reviews.author: Laria Carpenter

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Fun game, but gaining coins is slow compared to how many you need to delete letters.  You should start off with some and not zero.
reviews.author: Dan Beaule

reviews.title: Needs more levels
reviews.comment: Not sure how combining the 100 floors and 4 pics 1 word was supposed to work. It is 4 pics 1 word until you complete a level and then it shows an elevator which is about the only thing that links it to 100 floors so it makes that part of it kind of pointless.  Being 4 pics 1 word is almost a winning formula however i have to say that unless you\'re under 12 years old this will only offer 10 minutes play time as they are far too easy and there is only about 15 levels currently.
reviews.author: Marcus Laycock

reviews.comment: Its OK but can be frustrating at times especially if you have no coins
reviews.author: Kristie King

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Fun but hard at times. But a good game isnt fun unless its mind boogeling. Tried to get more coins wit dwnld but it didnt give em to me

reviews.title: 100 floors what\'s the word
reviews.comment: I like this game. I play the   game for memory. But when you put your hard earn to get coins and never receieve them . That\'s not right..........not right............ I am upset about this
